channel.title: [TuT] Changing text in the loading bar
channel.description:
For some request... Copyright 2006 ------
First, go to your client.java. Search for "Requesting" and stop there. It should look like this: [code]Requesting Animations[/code]
Then replace with the text you want. Then search down from that place for [code]method13[/code]
Then replace with your text. Continue this until you reach Preparing game engine. You have just replaced your bar with your own text.

Rictoo:

… Not trying to be an ass. But was this really a tutorial?

Hes just trying to help out. Even if it is very basic it will encourage new people to edit the client.
